last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: The remaining survivors risk it all as the half-zombies' humanity wanes. Who will finally make it onboard the ship to safety?

name: Zombieverse
overview: In Seoul, where a zombie virus outbreak has run amok, who will outwit the undead in the face of challenging quests and come out alive? In this exciting variety show, a group of celebrities complete quests and work together to survive a zombie virus outbreak.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: No one is safe from being bitten in "Zombieverse"! A virus breaks out on the set of a dating show, leading the castmates to their very first quest.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The group encounters other survivors at a supermarket. But they quickly learn that danger looms from every aisle, as the zombies take their first victim.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The survivors plan their dangerous escape from the supermarket. But panic ensues when a betrayal puts a teammate in harm's way.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: As the group braves the relentless zombies, they face a predicament. They later flee to the countryside, but is the sleepy town as zombie-free as it seems?

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Now separated and in danger, the survivors attempt to uncover the secrets of the quaint town. Will they be able to escape in one piece?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: An infected survivor awaits the inevitable. Meanwhile, newcomer Journalist Kim offers up new information on the zombies — is he to be trusted?

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: With an escape plan figured out, the survivors head to a theme park for temporary refuge. But hidden threats — and other surprises — lurk within.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The remaining survivors risk it all as the half-zombies' humanity wanes. Who will finally make it onboard the ship to safety?
